name: Davidoff - Limited Editions - 2024 Year of the Dragon Gran Toro
additionalNotes: Each Limited Edition cigar has a story. These stories require only the best tobaccos so only limited amounts are produced. Learn more about their uniqueness from Davidoff, AVO and Camacho. Davidoff Limited Edition Cigars are a truly special cigar released in small quantities every year. Using only the finest of tobacco, the Davidoff Limited Edition Cigars are hand-made by the top cigar rollers at the Davidoff factories. Featuring a smooth draw, perfect burn, and seamless wrapper, the Davidoff Limited Edition Cigars are the crème-de-la-crème of cigars. Extremely well balanced, a flavorful smoke, and a long finish are just some of the fine attributes you will find on each and every Davidoff Limited Edition Cigar.
